question: products, import, limit, limitation, unlimit
answer:
Import Products from Suppliers means adding AliExpress products to the Import List in ANTDIY where you can edit product prices and titles and other information. Import Products to Stores means transferring products from ANTDIY to your online store.


For these products imported into the store by ANTDIY, we will monitor supplier data and automatically update the price inventory data. This requires a lot of our technical resources, so we set a limit on the number.
And if you would like to import more products to your store, we strongly recomment you to upgrade your plan..

question: unlimit, products
answer:
ANTDIY was initially designed to help micro and small sized companies and individuals, so that they can do dropshipping business simply and efficiently. The number of products uploads in our plan is reasonable and in line with the needs of our clients.



We recomment you upgrade your plan to Pro Plan and join our Seed User Program for free so that we could provide more quota for you to better cater your needs. Please add our WhatsApp：+852 69412090 for further discussion.

question: import, products, 1688
answer: Dear friend, currently our ANTDIY Pro Plan can import products from 1688 to your Shopify store. However, unlike the orders from AliExpress, thoses from 1688 cannot be placed directly, which requires an inquiry before placing an order. Therefore, our app has been unable to place an order directly with the suppliers on 1688. If you are interested, I can arrange an online scaling session to demonstrate our Pro system to you at no cost.
